statements: SELECT * FROM parks;
SELECT park_name, area_size FROM parks;
SELECT park_id, location FROM parks WHERE area_size > 100;
SELECT * FROM parks WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT park_name, open_hours FROM parks WHERE area_size < 50;
SELECT park_name, area_size, location FROM parks WHERE area_size > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM parks WHERE park_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT park_name, area_size FROM parks WHERE location='Central Park' AND open_hours='9 AM - 5 PM'
SELECT park_name, location FROM parks WHERE area_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY park_id DESC
SELECT MAX(area_size) AS largest_area_size FROM parks
SELECT * FROM parks;
SELECT park_name, park_district FROM parks;
SELECT park_name, park_size FROM parks WHERE park_size > 50;
SELECT * FROM green_spaces WHERE space_type = 'garden';
SELECT space_id, space_name, space_location FROM green_spaces ORDER BY space_id DESC;
SELECT park_name, park_district FROM parks;
SELECT park_name, park_size FROM parks WHERE park_district='Central';
SELECT space_name, space_type, space_location FROM green_spaces;
SELECT park_name, park_size, park_district FROM parks ORDER BY park_size DESC;
SELECT park_name, space_name, space_type, space_location FROM parks JOIN green_spaces ON parks.park_id = green_spaces.park_id;
SELECT * FROM parks
SELECT name, area FROM parks
SELECT id, name, area FROM parks WHERE area > 100
SELECT * FROM green_spaces ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT park_id, COUNT(visitor_name) AS total_visitors FROM park_visitors GROUP BY park_id HAVING total_visitors > 5
SELECT * FROM parks WHERE area > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, area FROM parks WHERE id = 3
SELECT park_id, visitor_name FROM park_visitors WHERE visitor_name LIKE '%John%' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10
SELECT * FROM green_spaces WHERE location = 'New York' AND name LIKE '%Central Park%'
SELECT park_id, COUNT(visitor_name) AS visitor_count FROM park_visitors GROUP BY park_id HAVING visitor_count > 50 ORDER BY visitor_count DESC
SELECT * FROM parks ORDER BY park_name ASC;
SELECT park_name, park_location FROM parks WHERE park_area > 50;
SELECT park_name, park_area, park_location FROM parks WHERE park_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM parks WHERE park_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT park_id, park_name, park_location FROM parks ORDER BY park_area DESC;
SELECT park_id, park_name, park_area FROM parks;
SELECT space_name, space_area, has_trees FROM green_spaces WHERE has_trees = TRUE;
SELECT park_id, park_name, park_location FROM parks WHERE park_area > 50;
SELECT * FROM park_ratings ORDER BY date_rated DESC;
SELECT park_name, park_area, maintenance_cost FROM parks JOIN maintenance_records ON parks.park_id = maintenance_records.park_id;
SELECT * FROM parks;
SELECT park_name, location FROM parks;
SELECT park_name, area_acres FROM parks WHERE area_acres > 100;
SELECT * FROM park_entrances ORDER BY entrance_name DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM park_visitors WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT park_name, location, area_acres FROM parks WHERE area_acres > 100
SELECT feature_name, description FROM park_features WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50 ORDER BY feature_name ASC
SELECT entrance_name, latitude, longitude FROM park_entrances WHERE latitude < 40.75 ORDER BY longitude DESC
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM park_visitors WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT park_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM parks INNER JOIN park_reviews ON parks.park_id = park_reviews.park_id GROUP BY park_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 4.5
